titles.title: Authorizing the printing as a House document of "United States House of Representatives, The Committee on Ways and Means: A History, 1789-2006".
Authorizing the printing as a House document of "United States House of Representatives, The Committee on Ways and Means: A History, 1789-2006".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Ehlers asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the printing as a House document of "United States House of Representatives, The Committee on Ways and Means: A History, 1789-2006."
